title: Account Hacking
body: My account"kingkobra777" was hacked 24 days ago, and I have seen no game activity on it. My password or username has been changed, and the email too. I have never given the password to another person, and Riot do not respond to my emails. I am not sure if it was a keylogger, although I do not believe so. Is there any help I can recieve, rioter, or not. <3 ^.^

replies.body: Riot always responds to tickets with only very tiny exceptions. Are you spamming them with tickets by chance? Because if you submit a new ticket, or add more to an old one before you get a response from Riot it will drop you back to the bottom of the ticket queue.
